short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly search highlighted text in ChatGPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search In ChatGPT is a browser extension that streamlines your workflow by allowing you to quickly search highlighted text directly in ChatGPT. Designed for researchers, writers, and anyone who regularly uses ChatGPT, this extension saves time and boosts productivity.

üîç Quickly search highlighted text with a simple right-click.
